properties.name: Agra
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This is where the Taj Mahal is located.

properties.name: Amritsar
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This is where the Golden Temple is.

properties.name: Chandigrah
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This is where my family lives. This is where my parents are from.

properties.name: Jammu
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This is another city where my family lives.

properties.name: Karnal
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This is just a moderate size city on the way to Delhi. It\'s a great place to stop for food.

properties.name: Kathua or Katra
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87There is holy hindu temple located here called Vaishno Devi. It takes a 7 mile hike just to get there. I think the name of the city has been changed to Kathua but it use to be called Katra.

properties.name: Mussorie
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This is another city in the mountains close to China. Very cool and alot of scenic views

properties.name: New Delhi, India
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87New Delhi, IndiaThis is where my plane landed. We shopped here and went to the Red Fort.

properties.name: Panipat
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This is pretty much the same thing as Karnal. It just a great place to stop on the way to delhi to get good food.

properties.name: Shimla
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This city is located in the mountainous regions of India. Also has many scenic views.

properties.name: Srinagar
properties.description: Posted by Vgill87This is a pretty cool city with alot of mountains and lakes. Also alot of scenic areas as well. This city is located in Kashmir which makes it a little dangerous to visit because this is considered holy land and territory which currently being fought over by Pakistan and India.
